column5: I will respectfully sugest that this is either a sign that you have too much money, or you have an unhealthy fascination with coffee.  http://ca.autos.yahoo.com/news/we-put-in-car-espresso-maker-to-the-test-231611428.html
Not sure how you get "to much money"  He's very fortunate if you ask me and I'm happy for the guy.    cheers

I said: "too much money" the post was meant to be somewhat humorous.  But if we were to be serious the question would be: Why would someone spend $200 to make a mediocre cup of expresso in their car when they likely have a $1000 machine in their kitchen?  I know what my answer is.
ToGo cups, how do they work?  lol
